show-and-share-text: Show and share with your friends the products you want yo buy.
wishlist-landing-page-title: Our website is completely free to use, so start creating your Wishlist today and never miss out on your must-have products again!
wishlist-landing-page-sub-title: Create your dream Wishlist and never miss out on your favorite products again!
wishlist-landing-page-footer: Whether you're shopping for yourself or sharing with friends and family, our Wishlist website makes it easy to keep track of everything you want.
wishlist-landing-page-item-product-form: With our easy-to-use platform, you can save any product you love, attach the store's URL where you found it, and even register the lowest price you've seen.
wishlist-landing-page-item-mobile: And it's compatible with both desktop and mobile devices, so you can access your Wishlist from anywhere.
wishlist-landing-page-item-share: With our sharing feature, you can easily share your Wishlist with others, making it the perfect tool for special occasions like birthdays, weddings, and holidays.
